about_the_game:
1 - Who am I?

Hi, I'm Ritch Michaels. I'm passionate about video games, movies, series and books of all kinds. After a friend introduced me to a visual novel, I fell in love with the genre and started developing one with the resources and knowledge I had at the time. I had to start from zero and learn everything myself. I never finished this game. It's not that I didn't like it, but I didn't find it ambitious or interesting enough. So I decided to move on to an idea that had been in my head for years, that I'd started writing and that was originally intended to be a short story. I said to myself: "After all, why not ?"

And so this project was born, which has gone by several names but is now called :

LOVE ! again ...

2 - What is LOVE ! again ... ?

Synopsis:

You're a successful man with a good situation, but love isn't exactly on the cards. Your best friends are all married, and you ask yourself this question:

“What if I'd made different choices in my life ?”

Then something unexpected happens,, and you'll discover the answer to that question !

This game is for anyone who enjoys narrative, choices, comedy and drama. The game will make you ask yourself questions like :

“Do I have the right to change other people's lives for my own benefit ?”

You'll follow the story through moments of free roaming, during which you'll be able to visit certain places and,at certain points in the story, you'll have to choose one path to follow rather than another. You'll then be able to replay the game, making other choices and experience a new adventure.

A word about future additions:

  • More romances will be added later.

  • Collectibles will be added (music, images, etc ...).

  • Multiple endings are planned... at the end.

  • Secrets to discover ...

3 - What are the strong points of LOVE ! again ...?

- Several exciting stories to experience

- Humor, emotion ...

- Countless choices

- Lots of secrets to find

- Great care taken in the creation and use of music

- Multiple endings

- Excellent replayability

Thanks for taking the time to read my page, and see you soon in the LOVE ! again ... community ^^
